translations.english: In the fourth month, they attacked Yingchuan to the south and massacred the population.
Through Zhang Liang, they then seized the lands of Han.

translations.chinese: 時趙別將司馬卬方欲渡河入關，沛公乃北攻平陰，絕河津。
translations.english: At this time, the Zhao general Sima Ang was about to cross the river into the passes. Pei Gong attacked Beiyin to the north and cut off the river crossings.

translations.chinese: 南，戰雒陽東，軍不利，從轘轅至陽城，收軍 中馬騎。
translations.english: To the south, they fought east of Luoyang. The battle went badly. They retreated from Huan Pass to Yangcheng and gathered cavalry from among the troops.

translations.chinese: 六月，與南陽守齮戰犨東，大破之。
translations.english: In the sixth month, they fought Nanyang governor Yin east of Chu, greatly defeating him.
